name: Pimple Popper Pixel
description:
Pimple Popper Pixel is 8-bit of pimple goodness and 100% pimpletastic! If you have tried our original Pimple Popper game, you'll love the twist of pixelated pimples!

FEATURES:
- 4 types of pimples
- 5 characters
- swipe the hair away from the faces to uncover those pimples that are hiding from plain view!
